name: The YE
description:
WARNING: THIS IS NOT THE OFFICIAL RELEASE. This is under development.

Version History:

Alpha 1.0wa: Testing

---------------------------------

Controls

------------

Up: W
Down: S
Left: W + A
right: W + D
------------------------------
To Move Straight Left: Do "W + A" and then hold "A"
To Move Straight Right: Do "W + D" and then hold "D"
------------------------------------------------
